doc.field: Records of the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program
Records of the Jamaica Peace Corps Training Program
Series II. Peace Corps Program Development
Series II. Peace Corps Program Development

1.25 linear feet (2.5 boxes) arranged chronologically. This series contains national and international Peace Corps programs that provide an overview of the goals and principles of the agency. Other materials include the Peace Corps Fact Book, instructional handbooks, syllabi, training reports, testing requirements, project descriptions, and related correspondence and memorandum, which were used in the development of RISM's training program (see Series VI).
